data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Stoke with the kick-off.
Ben Thompson for Millwall has been booked by Jeremy Simpson and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
It's Millwall with the kick-off after the break.
The home team have replaced Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson with Matt Smith. This is the first substitution made today by Gary Rowett.
In the minute 64, Connor Mahoney is on a sub for Mason Bennett for Millwall.
Michael O'Neill is making the team's first substitution at The Den with Steven Fletcher replacing Tyrese Campbell.
Michael O'Neill (Stoke) is making a second substitution, with Jacob Brown replacing Sam Vokes.
In the minute 82, Murray Wallace is replacing Scott Malone for Millwall at The Den.
Stoke make their third substitution with Jordan Thompson replacing Nick Powell.
That's full-time at The Den. The final score is 0-0.
Jacob Brown (Stoke) has received a yellow card from Jeremy Simpson.
